ImyaTweaks.Title: Change the Max Storage Capacity of all Land Underground Depot Buildings.
ImyaTweaks.Description: You can Increase or Decrease the Max Storage Capacity of all Land Underground Depot Buildings

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom Max Storage Capacity for all Land Underground Depot Buildings
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the Max Storage Capacity of all Land Underground Depot Buildings ( Mod default settings = 30 )
